GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
net/tls: fix tls_sk_proto_close executed repeatedly

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit 9b95ee8990d9b4b6086c309632b9d0d576833abe, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 95fa145479fbc0a0c1fd3274ceb42ec03c042a4a. For more details please see the references link.
